attributes.action: Make Furlough Available for People Not Just Businesses
attributes.additional_details:
1 To protect those Billions of pounds invested so far into the British economy to protect jobs and don't let it go to waste Government must follow through.
2 Large companies going ahead with mass redundancies regardless extended support GOV should consider banning of all redundancies for the period of extended Furlough.
3 Grants payed out for large companies by GOV to protect jobs seems to be a tool to earn time on Tax payer expense for a better redundancy strategy.
attributes.background:
1. Make furlough available through job centers for people who being made redundant after a number of month of furlough.
2. Businesses proposed mass redundancies ignoring the extended furlough scheme put under investigation to determine that grants from GOV aren't only used to reduce workforce
